message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.
Lets update the @src/lib/landingPage/PricingTable.svelte so that the background matches with the rest of the site. Maybe we should use @src/lib/shell/GlassBackground.svelte

content.text:
I'll help you update the PricingTable component to use the GlassBackground component for consistent styling with the rest of the site.

Looking at the current code, I can see that line 50 has a Card with `class="flex flex-col opactiy-50 w-full bg-green-400"` which appears to be a temporary/test background color. Let me update it to use the GlassBackground component instead.

lines: +      <Card class="flex flex-col w-full bg-transparent border-0 shadow-none">

content.text:
Perfect! I've updated the PricingTable component to use the GlassBackground component. Here's what I changed:

1. **Added GlassBackground import** (line 11) - Imported the component from `@/shell/GlassBackground.svelte`

2. **Wrapped each pricing card with GlassBackground** (line 51) - Added `rounded-lg overflow-hidden` classes to ensure proper corner rounding

3. **Updated Card styling** (line 52) - Made the Card background transparent (`bg-transparent`), removed the border (`border-0`), and removed the shadow (`shadow-none`) since the GlassBackground component now provides the visual styling

The pricing cards will now have the same glassmorphism effect as the rest of your site, with:
- Backdrop blur effect (default `lg` = 16px)
- Semi-transparent background with proper opacity
- Border glow and shadows
- Automatic dark mode support

The green test background (`bg-green-400`) has been removed, and the cards will now blend beautifully with your site's design language.
